body.name: Allewie Full Size Platform Bed Frame with Fabric Upholstered Headboard and Wooden Slats Support, Fully Upholstered Mattress Foundation/No Box Spring Needed/Easy Assembly, Dark Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 11 mins
features: Quality Advantage: Full size bed frame is made of high-quality metal and wood, super sturdy and durable. Heavy-duty support feet are designed with plastic plugs add to the bottom to care for your floor. Maximum weight recommendation: 800 pounds.

Minimalist & Noise-Free: The bed frames full with a padded upholstered headboard It's stylishly suitable for different types of decor. The EVA mute bar prevent noise from friction, no squeaking or creaking.

No Box Spring Needed: Designed with solid wood slats, simple assembly and the most important thing to note is the mattress doesn't slide around on it, memory foam or spring mattress without the need for a box spring.

Quick Assemble: with clear instructions, easy to assemble in an hour, and the full bed frame is very snug and tightly held together, you'll never had issues with breaking or bending. Fit perfectly for a mattress of 8-14 inches.
All In One: Each part of the full size bed is clearly labeled and everything you need is packed and shipped into one box.

Does the mattress slide around on the frame? The mattress doesn't slide around on the slats. What is the recommended thickness of the mattress? Perfectly adapted to 8-14 inches mattresses. What is the clearance under the bed? 4.3 inches. Dose the headboard padded & soft? Yes, the headboard is upholstered and made of skin-friendly material. Does the bed frame come with the essential hardware, tools & instructions? Yes. All you need to assemble is well-packaged and ship in one box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this particular queen bedframe/headboard combo because it seemed to have a slightly wider and taller profile than most other sets in this price range. And I prefer a taller, more prominent headboard.All parts were well packaged and exhibited no damage out of the box. No parts/tools were missing. Includes everything you need for assembly including the alan wrench and mini wrench spanner.Assembly was not as bad as I was anticipating. I actually assembled the entire frame myself (no help whatsoever) in a little over an hour and a half. Not bad at all. The instructions were especially clear and everything was diagrammed properly, which I appreciated.The wood slat supports were thick and sturdy. Once all was assembled, it just 'felt' solid. I did not mate this set with a box spring, but only a 12 inch hybrid queen mattress...and it filled in the gap between the frame and headboard PERFECTLY.I've now been sleeping on this combo for over a month, and the frame and headboard still feels solid as ever. No squeaking/wobbling/movement.Be aware this is a low profile bed, so may not be suitable for elders or people with back issues. As previously mentioned, combined with a 12 inch hybrid mattress, it's very comfortable for me to get in and out of.One thing to note: with the headboard, the wide horizontal slats may not line up perfectly on the ends after assembly. If that's the case, simply loosen the bolts holding in the affected slat, and you can reposition it as desired. Mine looks just like the picture now.Great looking set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for money
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, even for one person alone. The article was well package, all pieces and hardware was there. After a couple of nights, the bed feels sturdy, the headboard looks nice and is comfortable and soft. Our 13-inch mattress fits perfectly on the frame and I like that I can comfortably sit on my bed thanks to the low base. Some of the reviews mention an unpleasant smell or bedbugs, which made me a bit nervous, but I didn't have any issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and inexpensive
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for something sturdy and simple this is it. I typically like a little taller bed frame and and a taller head board but those are kind of expensive for my needs rn. This is cute, easy to assemble, and sturdy! The clearance to under the bed is low, so if you’re hoping to store some things under here theyd have to be small items, I couldn’t get my small/medium tv box to slide under the bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Bed Frame with No Box Spring Necessary
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Allewie Queen Size Platform Bed Frame, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This bed frame is not only stylish but also somewhat sturdy. The dark grey fabric upholstery gives it a modern and elegant look that complements my bedroom decor perfectly.Assembly was a breeze, and I was able to put it together on my own in no time. The wooden slats provide excellent support for my mattress, eliminating the need for a box spring. I appreciate the thoughtful design, and the headboard adds a touch of comfort for sitting up and reading or watching TV in bed.Overall, the Allewie Queen Size Platform Bed Frame is a fantastic product. It's affordable, well-made, and aesthetically pleasing. I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a new bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bed was easy to assemble, sturdy and looks good! It took my husband and I an hour or so to assemble. Bought it for our 3 year old and it seems to be a perfect fit for him. It’s lower to the ground which is good for kids. We paired it with a 10” mattress and it was a perfect fit. I wouldn’t go less than 10” for the mattress but it would be fine if you went for a little more than 10”. Overall it was a good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a queen size bed frame from this company. I was a little disappointed on how long it was going to take to get delivered orginally, amazon quoted over 10 days for it to be delivered. To my surprise it got to my house 5 days earlier then originally quoted. It came in a normal sized box. I opened the box to find an easy "how to" set up guide. There was a second box that had all the hardware needed. It was a breeze to put together. Total time for assembly was under an hour. Included in the the box was a note from the supplier saying if I had any questions or difficulties I could contact him directly.I have had it set up for 4 nights now. It is sturdy and looks great. It makes no noise and it doesn't move.I highly recommend this bed frame. I am going to reorder another one for guest rooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and design
reviews.reviewText: I’m very happy with our new headboard. It is the color and design I was looking for at a great price. The parts were smartly designed to fit together securely and it was a simple project that took about 2 hours to complete.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Take your time putting this bed together to make sure all the holes will be aligned. Pressing down firmly while placing the screws in helps 100%. Follow the directions. his is a very beautiful product and should have better reviews. This bed is well worth the money! Thank you Allewie!
